## SimpleBoundingBoxCollider class

Avatar extension to determine collision using [BoundingBox](https://threejs.org/docs/?q=Box3#api/en/math/Box3.setFromObject)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class SimpleBoundingBoxCollider implements AvatarExtension 
```
**Implements:** [AvatarExtension](./three-avatar.avatarextension.md)
